titleStmt.title: Introduction to Populating a Website with API Data
titleStmt.author: Go Sugimoto

sourceDesc.p: Born digital, in a markdown format. This lesson is original.

abstract.p: This lesson introduces a way to populate a website with data obtained from another website via an Application Programming Interface (API). Using some simple programming, it provides strategies for customizing the presentation of that data, providing flexible and generalizable skills.
